body.p: The installer places two test files in the tmp folder within the chosen installation folder (by default, C:\Program Files\Miramo):
To test the installation, start a DOS command window and enter the following commands:cd /d "%MM_HOME%/tmp" miramo -Opdf test.pdf test.xml miramo -Opdf testbook.pdf testbook.xml
The ’test’ jobs will be visible in the mmVisor ’Jobs’ window area:
